overview: Mr. Hugh Patrick Sloane is the Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Sloane Robinson Investment Services Limited and manages the International and Japan portfolio. He founded Sloane Robinson in 1993. Additionally he serves on the Advisory Board of Sloane Robinson Private Equity LLP. Mr. Sloane began his investment career at GT management in 1979, where he worked initially in Hong Kong as an Economist for the Asian region.
